Onboarding.defiWorld: Defi world in a better way
Onboarding.createAccountSubTitle: The account name is only stored locally and will never be shared with Shuttle or any third parties
Onboarding.createAccountDescription: Your account name will become the name of your main account and the prefix of your sub-accounts. You can change the account names at any time
Onboarding.secretRecoveryPhaseTitle: What is the secret recovery phrase?
Onboarding.videoGuide: Watch this 1 minute video to learn about secret recovery phrases and how to secure your wallet
Onboarding.generateSeedTitle: Back up your secret recovery phrase
Onboarding.generateSeedInstructionsOne: Store your secret recovery phrase somewhere safe
Onboarding.generateSeedInstructionsTwo: If you lose your phrase, you won't be able to access your wallet
Onboarding.generateSeedInstructionsThree: Never show the phrase to anyone
Onboarding.verify3words: Choose the 3 words matching their position in the recovery phrase
Onboarding.freeNftTitle: You got a free NFT! Show off this NFT as your account image
Onboarding.chooseNetwork: Choose the networks you want your wallet to run on
Onboarding.enableNetworks: Please enable the networks you want to use. You can add new networks anytime in the future
Onboarding.showExistingAssetsSubTitle: These are the assets in the wallet you just imported. Please choose which tokens you want to show. You can hide or add these tokens anytime
Onboarding.setGuide: This enables smooth connection to web applications
Onboarding.shareGuide: Share where u click. No identifying data is collected.
Onboarding.createProAccountVideoTitle: Create a   PRO account with advanced feature
Onboarding.createProAccountVideoGuide: With a smart contract wallet, you can allow multi-Signatures to better protect your assets, and pay the network fee with any token you have. You can creagte one in the "Accounts" when you have some fund in this wallet
Onboarding.easyRecoveryVideoAppTitle: Easier recovery methods are only available in iOS
Onboarding.videoGuideEasyRecoveryApp: No need to worry about forgetting the secret recovery phrase anymore. Backup your wallet key as 3 separated files in different locations
Onboarding.toAddMultiChain: To add multi-chain accounts, enter or paste your 12 or 24 word Secret Recovery Phrase
Onboarding.toAddSingleChain: To add a single network wallet, enter or paste your 64 word Private Key
Onboarding.downloadIosAppRecovery: Download iOS app for other recovery methods
Onboarding.restorGuide: If you restore using another Secret Recovery Phrase, your current wallet, accounts and assets will be removed from this app permanently. This action cannot be undone.

Account.connectedAccounts: You have {{length}} accounts connected to this site.
Account.modalTitle: Backup the private key before hiding the account
Account.modalSubTitle: If you want to import it later, you will need the private key
Account.importAccountMessage: Imported accounts will not be associated with your originally created Shuttle account Secret Recovery Phrase
Account.editAccoutNotify: Notify all users who interact with this account that you’ve changed the username
Account.usernameMinimum: Username must be at least 3 characters
Account.usernameMaximum: Username must be at most 15 characters

Wallet.defaultWalletDesc: This enables smooth connection to web applications

Token.receiveTokenInstruction: This address can only be used to receive tokens on {{token}}
Token.sendWithLowGas: Send with lower gas fee later
Token.scheduledSendModalTitle: Send {{token}} with lower gas fee later
Token.scheduledSendModalSubTitle: we will cancel your sending request if the gas fee does not meet the ideal price before the due time
Token.swapConfirmInstruction: Your assets will be locked. You can cancel this transaction anytime.
Token.addCustomToken: If you can’t find the tokens you want by searching, you can add custom tokens.
Token.TryAddCusotmToken: Try a different symbol or name. Or add a custom token.
Token.customTokenInformation: How can I find the information below?
Token.cancelTransactionModalInstruction: You will still be charged the below gas fee. This action can not be undone
Token.sendTokenWithLowGasFee: Send {{token}} with lower gas fee later
Token.cancelGasFeeWithNoMatch: we will cancel your sending request if the gas fee does not meet the ideal price before the due time
Token.adjustMaxGasFee: Would you like to auto adjust MAX amount to leave some gas fee?
Token.GasPriceTitle: The gas price is 10 Gwei ≈ $0.57 now!

Credit.stableCoinContent: Swap any stable coin on any network to the token you want.
Credit.cardBankContent: Transak supports debit card and bank transfers in 59+ countries. Token deposits directly into your SUPRA account.

Settings.alalyticsDesc: Share where you click. No identifying data is collected.
Settings.analyticsSubTitle: Share where you click. No identifying data is collected.
Settings.logoutModalSubTitle: You will need to enter the password to log in again
Settings.addAddressSubTitle: You can send assets to other SUPRA wallet users through their usernames
Settings.privateKeyDisclosure: Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private key can steal any assets held in your account

Security.passwordProtectionSubTitle: Requiring password before sending and swapping assets
Security.autoLockInMins: Set the idle time <1>{{inMins}}</1> before the wallet will be locked.

ScheduledTransaction.totalFeeSaved: Total # of fee saved on {{network}} network
ScheduledTransaction.totalSavedSwapRate: Total # saved by setting ideal swap rate
ScheduledTransaction.transactionHistorySubTitle: Check out the history of all the scheduled transactions you've made on {{network}} network and how much fee was saved in each transaction
ScheduledTransaction.feeSavedByScheduling: Fee Saved by Scheduling this Transaction

Network.customNetworkWarning: A malicious network provider can lie about the state of the blockchain and record your network activity. Only add custom networks you trust.
Network.customNetworkInstructionTitle: How can I find the information below?
Network.networkUrlTooltip: The RPC URL is a set of protocols that allow us to interact with a blockchain
Network.chainIdTooltip: The chain ID is used for signing transactions

Popouts.allowSiteToSwitchNetwork: Allow this site to switch network?
Popouts.allowSiteToSwitchNetworkSubtitle: Switching networks will cancel all pending confirmations
Popouts.allowSiteToAddNetwork: Allow this site to add network?

Confirm.signRequestText: By signing, you allow this site to ... (explain what this is for)
Confirm.signMessage: Show the sign message from the platform here
Confirm.connectRequestContent: By granting permission, you allow this site to view the addresses of your permitted accounts. Only connect with sites you trust.
